GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article by it's article ID

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: provides an array of all comments on a single article given by ID

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a comment to an article with a username and body, returning the new comment

comment.body: I really miss chocolate Paddlepops, and they only cost 50c when I was a kid.
comment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: patches the vote property an article by article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment with a given comment_id
DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.exampleResponse: responds with a 204 status code and no content
